entry.title: Fighting in Ukraine Forces Two Million to Flee as Russia Presses Offensive
entry.content: The number of people forced to escape Ukraine has passed a milestone of two million, as the civilian toll of the Russia-Ukraine war mounted along with international efforts to pressure Russian President Vladimir Putin.

entry.title: Hundreds of Ships Trapped by Ukraine War, Endangering Sailors and Global Trade
entry.content: Port closings and missile strikes on vessels have had ripple effects on trade, including on grain markets. On one Bangladeshi ship, the consequences were dire.
